alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Yuma County through 515 PM MDT... At 430 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Eckley, or 13 miles northwest of Wray, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Yuma County, including the following locations... Wauneta. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 251 and 269. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
